name: Shoot Mania VR: Fun Zombies
description: In this exciting and dynamic game you have to protect your harvest from pumpkin-eating zombies who got into the habit to visit your garden!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590/AMD FX™ 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 270 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4790 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 1060 Storage: 270 MB available space
